John Daniel Hammerton (22 March 1900 – 15 June 1978) was an English footballer.
Flood played for Oughtibridge, Barnsley, Rotherham County, York City and Mansfield Town.

link_mentions.page: List of York City F.C. players (1–24 appearances)
response: As of the date above, 12 players have left the club with 24 career appearances; Bobby Warrender, Fred Marlow, Brad Halliday, Bradley Fewster, Tom Mitchell, John Hammerton, Liam George, Jamie Price, Nick Pope, Richard Tindale, Phil Taylor and Byron Webster. The list includes 14 players who are still contracted to the club, and so can add to their totals.
